page.title: 14CLUBS & GROUPS (CONTINUED)
page.content: There are 3 cub packs in the Village and also 3 brownie packs. There are football teams for ten years old up to eighteen,also there is a badminton club,cricket club and tennis organised for children. A drama club is held in Holts Meadow in the green hut every week and also there is a ballet club for girls. The club and societies for men and women are things like badminton,tennis football,drama,carpet_bowls,round table and the Monday club.The{Monday { {Club}is for elderly gentlemen to go to at the Youth Club, where they can play dominoes or cards peacefully.Carpet bowls is played in Village Hall which is in the High Street.Badminton is also played in the Village Hall on a Tuesday and Thursday.
